title: AISES National Conference Travel Scholarship
full_description: Provides travel assistance to AISES members attending the AISES National Conference. Scholarships are awarded to eligible American Indian, Alaska Native, Native Hawaiian, Pacific Islander, and Indigenous persons of Canada who are current AISES members.
short_description: Travel scholarship for AISES National Conference attendance
eligibility: Must be a current AISES member; Must be enrolled as a full-time student (undergraduate or graduate); Must have a minimum 3.0 GPA; Must attend the AISES National Conference; Tribal enrollment or documentation of Indigenous heritage required
